name: R5-NutritionOrder-R4B-NutritionOrder
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R5 NutritionOrder into FHIR R4B

element.display: Diet, formula or nutritional supplement request

target.display: Diet, formula or nutritional supplement request
target.comment: R5 `NutritionOrder` maps as Equivalent to R4B `NutritionOrder`

element.display: List of the patient's food and nutrition-related allergies and intolerances

target.display: List of the patient's food and nutrition-related allergies and intolerances
target.comment: R5 `NutritionOrder.allergyIntolerance` maps as Equivalent to R4B `NutritionOrder.allergyIntolerance`
R5 `NutritionOrder.contained` maps as Equivalent to R4B `NutritionOrder.contained`

element.display: Date and time the nutrition order was requested

target.display: Date and time the nutrition order was requested
target.comment: R5 `NutritionOrder.dateTime` maps as Equivalent to R4B `NutritionOrder.dateTime`

element.display: The encounter associated with this nutrition order

target.display: The encounter associated with this nutrition order
target.comment: R5 `NutritionOrder.encounter` maps as Equivalent to R4B `NutritionOrder.encounter`

element.display: Components to add to the feeding
Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
Product or brand name of the modular additive
Amount of additive to be given or mixed in
Type of modular component to add to the feeding
Formula feeding instruction as structured data

target.display: Formula feeding instruction as structured data
target.comment: R5 `NutritionOrder.enteralFormula.administration` maps as Equivalent to R4B `NutritionOrder.enteralFormula.administration`

R5 `NutritionOrder.enteralFormula.administration.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `NutritionOrder.enteralFormula.administration.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4B `extension`
R5 `NutritionOrder.enteralFormula.administration.id` maps as Equivalent to R4B `NutritionOrder.enteralFormula.administration.id`

element.display: Scheduling information for enteral formula products

target.comment: R5 `NutritionOrder.enteralFormula.administration.schedule` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `NutritionOrder.enteralFormula.administration.schedule` - schedule has change due to type change: R5 schedule BackboneElement has no equivalent or mapped type in R4B schedule

element.display: proposal | plan | directive | order | original-order | reflex-order | filler-order | instance-order | option

target.comment: R5 `NutritionOrder.intent` maps as Equivalent to R4B `NutritionOrder.intent` - intent has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/request-intent|5.0.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/request-intent|4.3.0 (Equivalent)
R5 `NutritionOrder.language` maps as RelatedTo to R4B `NutritionOrder.language` - language changed the binding strength from Required to Preferred
R5 `NutritionOrder.meta` maps as Equivalent to R4B `NutritionOrder.meta`

R5 `NutritionOrder.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `NutritionOrder.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4B `modifierExtension`
R5 `NutritionOrder.note` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `NutritionOrder.note` - note has change due to type change: R5 `note` `Annotation` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4B `note`
R5 `NutritionOrder.oralDiet` maps as Equivalent to R4B `NutritionOrder.oralDiet`

R5 `NutritionOrder.oralDiet.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `NutritionOrder.oralDiet.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4B `extension`
